subject: Football
lead_paragraph: David Carr, the top pick in the 2002 N.F.L. draft, is a major question mark as the Giants prepare to defend their N.F.L. title, since missing some practice due to injury.
snippet: David Carr, the top pick in the 2002 N.F.L. draft, is a major question mark as the Giants prepare to defend their N.F.L. title, since missing some practice due to injury.
